oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb al-Wāfī ʻalá madhhab al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfah : manuscript, 1334
Kitāb al-Wāfī fī al-furūʻ
Wāfī ʻalá madhhab Abī Ḥanīfah
Wāfī fī al-furūʻ
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nasafī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad , -1310
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 245r), copy completed on 20 Ramaḍān 734 AH [May 24, 1334 AD].
الحمد لمن من على عباده وعباده بارسال رسله وهداية سبله ... قال الشيخ الامام الاجل البارع مولانا حافظ الملة والدين... :Incipit
Seal on f. 2v signed Muḥammad Sayyid and dated 1230 AH [1815 AD].
Written in one column, 13 lines per page, in black and red.
Thick oriental paper. 17.5 x 14.5 cm. (12.5 x 10 cm.).
Only the upper cover of a blind stamped dark brown leather binding remains.
MS Arab 282. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic law
Hanafites
